titles.title: Federal Contractor Cybersecurity Vulnerability Reduction Act of 2025
Federal Contractor Cybersecurity Vulnerability Reduction Act of 2025
To require covered contractors implement a vulnerability disclosure policy consistent with NIST guidelines, and for other purposes.
